Question
========
  
Which of the two assumptions below belongs/ belong to the t-test for repeated measures?

I. The observations at time 1 are independent of the observations at time 2.
II. The difference scores are normally distributed.
  
Answerlist
----------
* Assumption I does, assumption II does not. 
* Assumption I does not, assumption II does. 
* Both assumptions belong. 
* Neither assumption belongs.
